games.summary: Cade Cunningham scored eight of his 18 points in the final 3:21, and the Detroit Pistons rallied to beat the Atlanta Hawks 99-98 on Monday night. Nickeil Alexander-Walker added 26 points and Onyeka Okongwu scored 20.
blurbs: 📋 Daniss Jenkins (DET) made just his 5th start this season. 6 pts, 8 reb.

games.summary: Donovan Mitchell scored 43 points to lead the Cleveland Cavaliers to a 135-119 victory over the Indiana Pacers on Monday night. Pascal Siakam had 26 points for Indiana, and Andrew Nembhard scored 21.
blurbs: 📋 Jay Huff (IND) made just his 5th start this season. 15 pts, 3 reb.
📋 Dean Wade (CLE) made just his 3rd start this season. 9 pts, 2 reb.
⬆️ Nae'Qwan Tomlin (CLE) played 27 min (season avg: 16). 6 pts, 6 reb, 1 ast.
⬆️ Tyrese Proctor (CLE) played 22 min (season avg: 12). 12 pts, 2 reb, 0 ast.

games.summary: CJ McCollum scored 28 points, including a 3-pointer with 14.4 seconds remaining that helped the Washington Wizards outlast the Milwaukee Bucks 129-126 on Monday night. scored 30 points for Milwaukee in his second game back from knee surgery.
blurbs: 📋 Marvin Bagley III (WSH) made just his 2nd start this season. 22 pts, 8 reb.
⬆️ Tristan Vukcevic (WSH) played 20 min (season avg: 9). 16 pts, 2 reb, 2 ast.

games.summary: Michael Porter Jr . scored 35 points, Noah Clowney had 18 and the Brooklyn Nets beat the Charlotte Hornets 116-103 on Monday night.
blurbs: 📋 Tyrese Martin (BKN) made just his 4th start this season. 5 pts, 2 reb.

games.summary: Norman Powell scored 30 points against his former team, Bam Adebayo had 27 points and 14 rebounds in 32 minutes and the Miami Heat downed the reeling Los Angeles Clippers 140-123 on Monday night. Tyler Herro and Andrew Wiggins each scored 22 for the Heat, who trailed by two early in the second quarter before going on a 30-2 run.
ORLANDO, Fla. -- — Desmond Bane scored 18 of his 37 points in the fourth quarter, helping the Orlando Magic beat the Chicago Bulls 125-120 on Monday night.
blurbs: 📋 Ayo Dosunmu (CHI) made just his 5th start this season. 18 pts, 3 reb.
⬆️ Julian Phillips (CHI) played 21 min (season avg: 8). 10 pts, 3 reb, 0 ast.

games.summary: Anthony Davis scored a season-high 32 points in his second game back from injury, and the Dallas Mavericks beat the Denver Nuggets 131-121 on Monday night. Rookie Ryan Nembhard had 28 points and 10 assist, both career bests, to help Dallas win consecutive games for the first time this season.
blurbs: 📋 Spencer Jones (DEN) made just his 5th start this season. 28 pts, 5 reb.
📋 Naji Marshall (DAL) made just his 3rd start this season. 9 pts, 7 reb.
📋 Ryan Nembhard (DAL) made just his 3rd start this season. 28 pts, 3 reb.

games.summary: Lauri Markkanen scored 29 points and Keyonte George added 28 as the Utah Jazz outlasted the Houston Rockets 133-125 on Monday night. Kevin Durant , off target much of the game, scored 16 of his 32 points in the fourth quarter for Houston.
blurbs: 📋 Reed Sheppard (HOU) made just his 4th start this season. 9 pts, 2 reb.
⬆️ Aaron Holiday (HOU) played 33 min (season avg: 14). 10 pts, 2 reb, 2 ast.

games.summary: Dillon Brooks scored 33 points, Collin Gillespie added 16 of his career-high 28 in the fourth quarter, and the Phoenix Suns emphatically snapped the Los Angeles Lakers ' seven-game winning streak with a 125-108 victory Monday night.
blurbs: 📋 Collin Gillespie (PHX) made just his 3rd start this season. 28 pts, 4 reb.
